title: Strengthening Web-Based Distance Education Courseware Design and Operational Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented program for systematic utilization of web-based educational tools

learning_goals: Learners can operate educational content authoring tools using web-based courseware (e.g., WebCT) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain the process of developing web-based educational materials while complying with digital copyright laws
Learners can design and evaluate standalone web courselets for poetic device analysis in remote learning environments
Learners can diagnose technical issues that may occur during web-based education operations and propose basic solutions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
